name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Kacchi
description: Kacchi Mutton Biryani is a delicious rice dish where tender goat or lamb meat pieces are marinated with lots of fried onions, whole spices.

name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Chicken Biriyani
description: Traditional chicken biryani is made by layering marinated chicken at the bottom of a pot followed by another layer of par cooked rice, herbs.

name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Kabab
description: Kebabs consist of cut up or ground meat, sometimes with vegetables and various other accompaniments according to the specific recipe.

name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Pizza
description: A delicious pizza has an intensely cheesy flavor. The combination of tomato sauce and cheese creates a perfect marriage of flavor. The ingredients begin to brown during the baking process, which makes pizza taste so delicious.

name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Burger
description: The best burgers offer a combination of tastes and textures sweet, sour, salt with a bit of crunch. The patty needs to be juicy.

name: Muntasir Rifat
title: Sandwiches
description: A sandwich is a food typically consisting of vegetables, sliced cheese or meat, placed on or between slices of bread, or more generally any dish wherein bread serves as a container or wrapper for another food type.
